oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Armistice announcement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: English translation of the French order announcing the Armistice to the French Naval forces at Brest. Announcement is signed by Vice-Admiral P. Moreau. Document from a scapbook album of photographs and documents about George H. Harries. Vice-Admiral Frederic P. Moreau (1858-1929) commanded the French facilities at the port of Brest. He was awarded the Distinguished Service Medal by the U.S. Army. Harries commanded Base Section No. 5 (U.S. facilities in and around port of Brest).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
